channel.title: I need help

item.title: I need help
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

here it is you better use srl, and dont use this script yet cuz there is no anti random/ban in it but its a start

[code]{.include srl/srl.scar}

const rockcolor= 0; //insert rockcolor here

procedure mineit;
begin
repeat
findnormalrandoms;
findcolorspiral(x,y,rockcolor,3,3,515,336)
mmouse(x,y,3,3)
istextat2(9,9,‘Mine’,20)
mouse(x,y,2,2,true)
wait(random(300))
until(invfull)
if (invfull = true) then
end;

Procedure dropem;
begin
dropto(2,28);
end;

Begin
repeat
mineit;
dropem;
until(false)
end.[/code]

item.title: I need help
item.dc:creator: @yogi11115 yogi11115
item.description:
@yogi11115 wrote:

okok i guess if you dont know how to get this script to help me bank it then at least can someone help me with this script it all works on the mining part but i need something that will make it drop it or bring it to the bank someone plz help what can i do to make it do that heres my script
program Autominer;
{.include Si.scar}

Var x,y :Integer;

Procedure minerocks;
Begin
Findcolor(x,y,7565691,274,166,515,340)
Mouse(x,y,1,1, true)
Wait(5000)
End;

Begin
repeat
minerocks;
until(false)
end.
